cd /home/test/Personnel/DGOT/classement
sudo ls /media/test/Exchange/Personnel
sudo cp /media/test/Exchange/Personnel/Classement_2024.csv ./
sudo chown test:test Classement_2024.csv 
~/Projects/git/testing-solution/python/resources/scripts/test/dgot/classement/classement.sh -i Classement_2024.csv -o classement_2024.html
sudo cp classement_2024.html /media/test/Exchange/Personnel
